title: I want more songs from Pentakill :(

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OjGaWuE5,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2018-11-16T08:27:54.689+0000)
>
> Why not both?

I wanna some extreme metal, with a new band made by Ornn, Sion, Tryndamere and Kayn (who is pretty metal himself  https://medium.com/@danielzklein/context-at-some-point-in-january-this-year-someone-asked-in-an-ideation-meeting-what-kind-of-6ecb87c2edd1 )
I'm for more KDA! They brought me back to League!
they only do pentakill stuff when a skin for it comes along sadly, but we could get a new album for mordes rework, would a sick reveal
Yeah, giving the founder of Pentakill a new Album to go with his VGU would be bloody amazing.
Pentakill skins should be legendary. Or at least they should have the DJ Sona music feature in game somehow.

Tbh their instruments are great and i like the different styles of metal in their last album.. but the vocals sound incredibly boring.

They need a new vocalist who can do low growling and high screaming vocals.

> [{quoted}](name=wuthappen,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OjGaWuE5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-15T15:00:33.384+0000)
>
> Tbh their instruments are great and i like the different styles of metal in their last album.. but the vocals sound incredibly boring.
> 
> They need a new vocalist who can do low growling and high screaming vocals.

You forget that they are meant to be commercial
Don't you dare diss Jorn, he takes a lot of inspiration from Dio, who's probably one of the most influential vocalists in Metal history.
